summary: This mod adds a new follower named Agenor to your game .
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://farm9.staticflickr.com/8421/7875234220_1e1a366efa_c.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia]
[size=4]
This is my first contribution to Nexus. I made this as a request. This mod adds Agenor, a Nord warrior, to Whiterun. You will find him near Shrine of Talos. I made him level 25, didn\'t want him to be too overpowered . I\'m not thinking to do any uptades to this mod, because of my lack of skills in CK , you\'re welcome to improve him if you want =)[/size]

[size=5][b]Installation:[/b][/size]
[size=4]Use NMM or just put the Data folder to Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim[/size]

[size=5][b]Appearance:[/b][/size]
[size=4]For the exact look you will need the following mods : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] , [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141]High Res Face Maps for Men by Geonox[/url] , [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes[/url][/size]

[size=5][b]Known Issues :[/b][/size]
[size=4]You\'ll only encounter this if you\'re using UFO . Well , when you tell him \'\'Train some , you\'re weak...\'\' He doesn\'t level up, I don\'t know how to fix that. Other than that, he shouldn\'t have any problems.[/size]

[size=5][b]Permission :[/b][/size]
[size=4]You can upload my file to any site and you can modify/edit it as you wish , just give me credits, that\'s all i ask, thank you =)[/size]

[size=5][b]Credits:[/b][/size]
[size=4]Thanks to Bethesda for creating a legend like Skyrim.
Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148]Apachii[/url] for letting me use her hair.
Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4885394]SheWildWolf[/url] for teaching me how to make a front page and testing Agenor.
Thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3585853]toro66ro[/url] for precisely testing Agenor.
[/size][/font]
author: Dovahkiin89
